game.title: Find the stolen treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen treasure from the thief's hideout.
game.description: The local museum has had a valuable artifact stolen. The thief is known to have a hideout in the abandoned mine near the outskirts of town. Speak with the curator for more information.

task.objective: Speak with the curator to obtain more information.
task.description: You can find the curator in the museum, near the entrance.
The abandoned mine is located to the north of town, near the river.

task.objective: Enter the thief's hideout and retrieve the treasure.
task.description: The thief's hideout is located deep within the mine, past the old mining tunnels.
